body_html: Yes, that seems to be the only viable solution right now. But if we assume that I want to have some complex chain of calculations where calculating the final shape would we cumbersome, it would be nice to just write down the formulas with pycuda or scikit-cuda and then wrap the resulting memory/GPUArray back into a tensor.

body: Yes, that seems to be the only viable solution right now. But if we assume that I want to have some complex chain of calculations where calculating the final shape would we cumbersome, it would be nice to just write down the formulas with pycuda or scikit-cuda and then wrap the resulting memory/GPUArray back into a tensor.
